Articles.Content: When debugging a possible mod issue, I want to remove all mods that don't have any parts being involved so I know what I can remove without breaking my ship.  Maybe there is already one, but if not, could someone make a mod that lists all parts making a ship, and the mod that provides that part, and a file location.

I think KerbalX has a tool that lets people uploading ships tell others which mods are necessary to use the craft file. You may want to check on that.

https://kerbalx.com/
